(module advanced-file-io mzscheme 
  (require (lib "mred.ss" "mred") (lib "include.ss"))
  (provide include ;; Included in "Advanced Student": begin read display newline print write
           get-file put-file
           file-exists?
           directory-list path->string ;; for listing directories, extracting file names
           open-input-file open-output-file
           close-output-port close-input-port
           read-line flush-output))
